clearStatus() - Method in class lx4p.LXHueInterface
If there's been an error, tests the connection to the bridge which clears the error if it succeeds If testConnection returns error containing "unauthorized user" clearStatus will attempt to create the user The button on the Hue Bridge should be pressed before attempting to create a user.
